hint: Push filters down early, convert implicit comma joins to explicit ANSI JOINs, and pre-filter selective dimension tables (date_dim, item, customer_address) before joining.
Isolate selective date_dim filters into CTEs, then pre-filter all dimension tables into separate CTEs before joining with fact tables using explicit JOIN syntax.
Materialize all filtered dimension and fact subsets into CTEs, then restructure the self-join on date_dim by computing date ranges in a single pass before final aggregation.
Restructure the query by replacing IN lists with UNION ALL subqueries, transform the date self-join into an EXISTS correlated subquery, and decorrelate any dependent joins.
